top.title: Trump ties Greenland demands to Nobel Prize in message to Norway leader
top.summary: The US president says he no longer feels obliged to think only of peace, after not being awarded the annual prize.

top.title: 'Europe is at a total loss': Russia gloats over Greenland tensions
top.summary: The BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg analyses why pro-Russian government papers are full of praise for Donald Trump's desire to buy Greenland.

top.title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies aged 93
top.summary: One of the giants of 20th century fashion, his creations were worn by celebrities including Elizabeth Taylor, Julia Roberts and Gwyneth Paltrow.

top.title: How crypto criminals stole $700 million from people - often using age-old tricks
top.summary: As crypto wealth continues to grow, criminals are mixing sophisticated hacks with deception, and in some cases, real life violence.

top.title: Google appeals landmark antitrust verdict over search monopoly
top.summary: The tech giant is seeking a pause on court-ordered fixes aimed at limiting its monopoly power.

top.title: ChatGPT to carry adverts for some users
top.summary: OpenAI is also expanding its cheaper subscription tier, ChatGPT Go, to all countries where it operates.
